title: Undergrowth
description: "Branches entwined them both, scraping flesh, digging their way through clothing. Josie shook wildly in her mother’s arms, a terrified creature trapped..."What begins as pleasant stroll through an idyllic woodland turns into a desperate and terrifying fight for survival for a family of three... will anyone – mother, father or child – make it out of the hellish green inferno alive?!“UNDERGROWTH” is the latest horrifying tale from IAN LASKEY, author of the grotesque short story “WITHIN” (also available on Kindle). Fast paced, brutal and chilling, it is not for the faint of heart...
author: Ian Laskey
